Description: Online Payments Solutions for SaaS Providers, Developers, Businesses and Non-Profits.
Name: Shuttle

Methods.Name: Get Contract
Methods.Description: Get the details of a single contract.

Methods.Name: Update Contract
Methods.Description: Update the details of a single contract.

Methods.Name: Create Contract Payment
Methods.Description: For recurring payments which have an amount overdue you can instruct Bolt to attempt payment of the outstanding balance on either the default payment method or an alternative one.

Methods.Name: Update Payment Method URL
Methods.Description: Generate an encoded URL to direct a browser to, to allow a user to modify heir method of payment.

Methods.Name: Create Payment URL
Methods.Description: Generate an encoded URL to direct a browser to, to make a payment.

Methods.Name: Get Transaction
Methods.Description: Get the details of a single transaction.

Methods.Name: Webhook
Methods.Description: Provide the webhook URL to bolt in order to receive webhook notifications.
